casebody.head_matter:
401 A.2d 570
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Ernest FOWLER, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Submitted April 16, 1979.
Decided May 31, 1979.
William A. Fitzpatrick, Philadelphia, for appellant.
Robert B. Lawler, Asst. Dist. Atty., Chief, Appeals Div., James Garrett, Asst. Dist. Atty., Philadelphia, for appellee.
Before EAGEN, C. J., and O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, NIX, MANDERINO and LARSEN, JJ.
